name: GTFORM v0.5
description:
Made for DungeonCrawler Jam 2022.

It made by 50% of what i want. Had a bad programming conditions. 

It has a lot crash bugs :(

WASD - walking, QE - turn left/right

SPACE = shoot

You can send your troops to other rooms in Tactical Map (CLICK on MINIMAP)

You can manually design your robot in Design Menu (CLICK on your robot picture at right up corner)

To connect 2 parts click on a ground part slot and on a robot part slot of same colour.

music by https://slaleky.itch.io
